column1: # Name: Children in employment, work only and study and work (ages 7-14), male
# Definition: % of male children, ages 7-14, that are employed. Includes those who study and work and those who work only since breakdown by sex not available for individual segments.
# Source: Understanding Children's Work project based on data from ILO, UNICEF and the World Bank.
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
